name: Man on the MOon -PRE-ORDER of LIMITED PRINT
description:
ONLY 50 PRINTS MADE -signed and numbered
(only 30 prints remaining as of 7-15-13)

Print of Painting Man on the Moon by Nichole Paree DeWald
More about her art at https://www.facebook.com/NicholePareeArt
 Prints are done by Artist island. The prints are perfect high quality and  come out EXACTLY like the painting. Pricing was set for us by Artist Island. 50% of the proceeds go to OLHs Live,Give,Grow program for Hawaii's homeless shelter kids. 



(click image to enlarge)
*Purchase comes with Print and matting
*Other sizes can be made available upon request.

name: Surfers Turquoise
description:
Beautiful Surfboard inspired teardrop cut turquoise. Single gold/black pearl is thought to bring prosperity (in life and we're hoping in the waves too) Turquoise is thought to bring luck.

14kt gold wish bead chain 
turquoise
freshwater pearl
Swarovski crystal

*Click on image to enlarge
*Click on arrows to see other views

(ALL Proceeds of this piece go straight to helping the many homeless and foster youth here in Hawaii through the registered nonprofit Ocean Lotus Hawaii.)

name: The everyday Wrap
description:
Made from Durable material and versatile to fit any surf and any occasion. Can be worn as a Bracelet, anklet, or headband.



14 carat gold plated sterling silver beads
Greek leather cord

*Click on image to enlarge
*Click on arrows to see other views

(ALL Proceeds of this piece go straight to helping the many homeless and foster youth here in Hawaii through the registered nonprofit Ocean Lotus Hawaii. Thank you so much for your Kokua ;)

name: Peace Piece
description:
Bring Peace into your life and remind yourself to always be patient & forgiving for inner and outer peace. 

Made from silk cord, 14kt gold charm and beads

3 peices of jewelry in one: Headband, bracelet, anklet 


*Click on image to enlarge
*Click on arrows to see other views

(ALL Proceeds from this piece go strait to helping the many homeless and foster youth here in Hawaii)

name: Signature Golden Coin & aquamarine neckace
description:
Our signature Necklace!! 

Be an Ocean Lotus in this Simple elegant everyday necklace. The blue Aquamarine crystals represent the ocean and the coins ocean lotus symbol represents a person who will always rise above the rough waters and blossom.

*Coin: Completely handmade and designed by artist Nichole Paree in Hawaii
     -24k gold plated over sterling Silver
     -Front Ocean Lotus symbol as well as 'Live, give, grow' inscribed. 
       Which represents a way of life, as well as the program that the 
       money for this piece goes to for the homeless shelter youth.

*Chain made from Aquamarine crystals and 14k gold plated vermeil
*Gold plated beachy toggle clasp



*Click on image to enlarge
*Click on arrows to see other views
One picture is of the back of coin

(ALL Proceeds of this piece go straight to helping the many homeless and foster youth here in Hawaii through the registered nonprofit Ocean Lotus Hawaii)

name: Postivity wrap
description:
Turquoise has been thought to bring good luck, creativity and repel negativity since ancient times. We stacked this piece so that it could give you many days worth of good luck and positivity as possible.

Can be worn as a headband, necklace, bracelet, anklet, or upper armband

(Native Americans also would give turquoise as a sign of friendship, so it makes a great friendship necklace/bracelet.)


*Click on image to enlarge
*Click on arrows to see other views

(ALL Proceeds from this piece go strait to helping the many homeless and foster care youth in Hawaii)

name: Karma wrap
description:
This simple fun loving wrap is to remind you of Karma. The small gold circles represent "what goes around, comes around."

Leather
14kt gold circle charms and beads. 

Can be worn as Headband, anklet, bracelet or upper arm wrap.


*Click on image to enlarge
*Click on arrows to see other views

(ALL Proceeds from this piece go strait to helping the many homeless and foster care youth in Hawaii)

name: Modern Halo
description:

(Can be worn as a Headband or upper arm wrap)


*Click on image to enlarge
*Click on arrows to see other views

Turquoise is thought to bring good luck. In and out of the waves

Made from Durable material and versatile to fit any occasion. Can be worn as a Bracelet, anklet, headband, upper arm band, and necklace.

name: Carnelian wrap
description:
Carnelian was once considered strictly the property of the noble class. People holding a high social status were often buried with this gem stone. It is thought to bring wealth and prosperity


Carnelian
14kt gold beads
Jade lotus
Greak leather cord

*Click on image to enlarge
*Click on arrows to see other views

(ALL Proceeds of this piece go straight to helping the many homeless and foster youth here in Hawaii through the registered nonprofit Ocean Lotus Hawaii. Thank you so much for your Kokua ;)

name: Monetary Donation
description: Almost everything we do with the kids costs money. From food & beverages during tutoring and activities, to school supplies, tutoring/teaching materials, to surf board rentals, transportation, kayak/boat rentals, etc. We also provide the kids with some necessities that they don't have (clean clothes/swimsuit etc). If you would like to help the homeless and foster care youth with any of these things, we would really appreciate it. If you have a specific thing you would like the money to go to feel free to email us. Thank you so much for all your help/kokua!! All of us from OLH really appreciate it :)
